'''Tainted Hydro Phantasms''' are an [[Elite Enemy|elite]] enemy group of [[Elemental Lifeforms]]. They can be found in both [[Fontaine]] and [[Liyue]].

In combat, Tainted Hydro Phantasms will periodically enter an enraged state where they grow in size and utilize stronger attacks. They are permanently imbued with {{Hydro}} and are immune to {{Color|Hydro DMG}}, and cannot be [[Frozen]] while enraged.
